title: Skillet Ravioli With Broccoli Rabe Recipe
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Skillet Ravioli With Broccoli Rabe Recipe a try. For $2.22 per serving, this recipe covers 8% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 538 calories, 19g of protein, and 37g of fat. This recipe serves 3. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. Not a lot of people really liked this Mediterranean dish. A mixture of alfredo sauce, microwave-in-bag broccoli rabe, part-skim mozzarella cheese, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 17 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 26%. This score is rather bad. Similar recipes include Broccoli Rabe Ravioli with Parmigiano and Pistachios 2, Five-Spice Duck with Butternut Squash Ravioli and Broccoli Rabe, and Saut√©ed Broccoli Rabe Recipe.

winePairing.pairingText: Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio are my top picks for Ravioli. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. You could try Felsina Berardenga Chianti Classico ( Half-bottle). Reviewers quite like it with a 4.2 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 13 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Felsina Berardenga Chianti Classico ( Half-bottle)
productMatches.description: "Shows fresh berry, with hints of flowers, fresh herbs and chocolate. Full-bodied, with a fresh palate, well-integrated tannins and a balanced finish. Lots of cherry and light spice. Best after 2003."-Wine Spectator
